H0.text: Science is the goal of this to understand how and why things happen.

H1.text: Experience is the goal of this to understand how and why things happen.

H2.text: Inquiry is the goal of this, to understand how and why things happen.

H3.text: Theory is the goal of this, which is to understand how and why things happen.

A4.text: Experimentation is especially important in science to help establish causal relationships to avoid the correlation fallacy

A5.text: The scientific method allows for highly creative problem solving while minimising the effects of subjective and confirmation bias
